synopsis.text: Princess Neryulla's reincarnation, Miyako Negishi, along with her fellow university students, Haruka Saiki and Keiichiro Yamagishi, navigate modern-day Tokyo with their extraordinary magical abilities, feeling alienated from their peers. One fateful night, they are whisked away to a mystical realm, where they encounter a colossal gate. Upon opening it, they learn that Miyako is destined to vanquish the tyrannical Duran III, who has subjugated Neryulla's people. As the legendary warrior Neryulla, Miyako must now lead a rebellion against the oppressive Western Kingdom, all while questioning the true cost of her newfound responsibility.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
